verbs.description: reflectorize (third-person singular simple present reflectorizes, present participle reflectorizing, simple past and past participle reflectorized)

examples: The department, upon registering a vehicle, shall issue to the owner two partially or fully reflectorized license plates or devices for a motor vehicle, other than a motorcycle, and one partially or fully reflectorized license plate or device for all other vehicles required to be registered under this code. [1]
